column1: brenda whitson coomer| brenda whitson coomer
column4: 2015 at her residence. the muhlenburg county
column5: kentucky native was a daughter of the late robert harmon whitson and doris imogene mc. donald whitson. she was preceded in death by her husband frank leo coomer. mrs. coomer was a retired legal assistant for forty-six years
column8: ayers and moore law firm. mrs. coomer was an alumni of bowling green business university. she was a member of forest park baptist church where she also taught in the children's department for forty plus years. mrs. coomer was involved in various other committees
column10: building and pastor committees at forest park baptist church. survivors include her two daughters
column11: rhea michelle jones (hal) of bowling green
column14: deborah joan inman (joe) of bowling green; one brother
column15: bobby darrell whitson (jennifer) of bowling green; stepmother
column16: jo. ann whitson of bowling green; six grandchildren
column22: michael jones; four great grandchildren; several nieces and nephews. funeral services are scheduled for 1:00 pm wednesday
column24: 2015 at johnson-vaughn-phelps funeral home with burial in fairview cemetery. visitation will be from 3:00 pm- 8:00 pm tuesday
column26: 2015 at johnson-vaughn-phelps funeral home and again on wednesday from 11:00 am- 1:00 pm at the funeral home. memorial contributions may be made to hospice of southern kentucky
column27: american heart association and coomer-miller scholarship fund at forest park baptist church.
